source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_SEQ_00<tab>Though the Rose Knight cook seems exhausted, the fire in her eyes tells of work to be done.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_SEQ_00<tab>ローズハウスの薔薇騎兵団の従軍調理師は、つらそうに弁当を見ている。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_SEQ_01<tab>The Rose Knight cook has prepared packed meals for the men and women of Camp Cloudtop. In her old age, however, their delivery proves more difficult than she would care to admit. Determined to see her hard work is not wasted, she asks you to distribute three sets of packed meals in her stead. Pick up the packed meals and prepare to make your delivery.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_SEQ_01<tab>薔薇騎兵団の従軍調理師から弁当の配達を任された。ローズハウスの「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ABE01 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_SEQ_02<tab>You pick up the three sets of packed meals. See them safely to the knights of Camp Cloudtop.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ABE01 /var>を受け取った。ローズハウスの騎兵に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ABE01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_SEQ_03<tab>You have delivered all of the packed meals, garnering you many thanks for temporarily relieving the resident cook of her duties. Head back and speak with the Rose Knight cook.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_SEQ_03<tab>すべての弁当を配達した。ローズハウスの「薔薇騎兵団の従軍調理師」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_SEQ_04<tab>Though she lacks the vigor to jump for joy, her look of gratitude is unmistakable as she conveys the pleasure she takes in preparing their meals. Though the thinner air of the Sea of Clouds is harsh in her old age, she assures you a meal cooked by their hands is equally unkind, vowing to continue to work so long as she is able.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_SEQ_04<tab>薔薇騎兵団の従軍調理師に報告した。アバラシア雲海は空気が薄く、すぐに疲れてしまうことから、彼女は引退を考えていたらしい。しかし、彼女の弁当を楽しみにしている者のため、これからも弁当を作り続けるそうだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_TODO_00<tab>Pick up the packed meals for delivery.

target: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_TODO_01<tab>ローズハウスの騎兵に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ABE01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_TODO_02<tab>Report to the Rose Knight cook.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_TODO_02<tab>薔薇騎兵団の従軍調理師に報告

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LUNCHCLERK01739_000_000<tab>Hello there, <var 08 E905 ((missy)) ((laddie)) /var>. No doubt you've important work to attend to. Well, we all have a part to play. As a matter of fact, I should be handing out these meals, but these old bones don't move like they used to.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LUNCHCLERK01739_000_000<tab>おや、あんたは……手伝ってくれるのかい？
オバちゃん、ここの騎兵さんたちの食事を作ってるんだけど、
キャンプを歩き回るのも、この歳になると厳しくてねぇ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LUNCHCLERK01739_000_001<tab>But as I said, we all have a part to play. And I can't very well keep the good men and women of Camp Cloudtop waiting.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LUNCHCLERK01739_000_001<tab>でも、みんな楽しみにしてくれてるのに、
冷え切った食事で、ガッカリはさせられないでしょう？
できるだけ早く届けてあげたいの。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LUNCHCLERK01739_000_002<tab>I don't suppose you'd be willing to make a few deliveries in my stead, would you? The packages are clearly labeled. I can't offer much, but I will compensate you for your trouble.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LUNCHCLERK01739_000_002<tab>あんた、オバちゃんの代わりに配ってきてくれないかい？
そこの「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ABE01 /var>」を、3人に届けてほしいのさ。
たいしたものはないけど、ちゃんとお礼もするよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LUNCHCLERK01739_000_010<tab>Bless your heart. They're stationed close by, so it shouldn't take you long. Pray hurry─they're sure to be famished.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LUNCHCLERK01739_000_010<tab>あんた、オバちゃんの代わりに配ってきてくれないかい？
そこの「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ABE01 /var>」を、3人に届けてほしいのさ。
たいしたものはないけど、ちゃんとお礼もするよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LANIAITTE_000_020<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. To what do I owe the honor of your presence this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LANIAITTE_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>殿……
弁当など持ってどうしたというのだ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LANIAITTE_100_020<tab>A delivery from the cook? I was all but certain there would be none today. You have my thanks. And give her my best regards.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LANIAITTE_100_020<tab>私の食事を持ってきてくれたと！？
貴公にそのような雑務を任せるなど……も、申し訳ない。
彼女の仕事ぶりには感謝しているが、しっかり言い含めねば。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LANIAITTE_000_021<tab>I know she means well, but please remind her that she needs to rest.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LANIAITTE_000_021<tab>貴公にそのような雑務を任せるなど……も、申し訳ない。
彼女の仕事ぶりには感謝しているが、しっかり言い含めねば。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_MARIEL_000_022<tab>Ah, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Can I help you with something?
TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_MARIEL_100_022<tab>Oh, a meal from the cook! Why did she not come herself? Well, no matter. My thanks to you both.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_MARIEL_100_022<tab>これはオバ様の……ありがとうございます。
いつも感謝していると、お伝えください。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_MARIEL_000_023<tab>I know she thinks herself something of a maid, but she's really more like family. The camp wouldn't be the same without her.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_MARIEL_000_023<tab>これはオバ様の……ありがとうございます。
いつも感謝していると、お伝えてください。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_GILDON_000_024<tab>Whatever it is, make it quick. I cannot leave my post unattended for long.

TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_GILDON_100_024<tab>Oh! A meal from the cook! That she makes such fine cuisine from seemingly deplorable rations is nothing short of a miracle. Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. My compliments to the chef!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_GILDON_100_024<tab>これは、オバちゃんの弁当！
少ない配給の素材の中から、工夫を凝らした逸品！
旨くはありませんが、愛のある食事であ～る！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_GILDON_000_025<tab>Love makes for the best seasoning. Give her my thanks for the fine meal!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_GILDON_000_025<tab>少ない配給の素材の中から、工夫を凝らした逸品！
旨くはありませんが、愛のある食事であ～る！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LUNCHCLERK01739_000_030<tab>Welcome back. I take it by your empty hands their meals have been delivered. Excellent. Short though the trip may be, a few fulms feel like malms at my age. Heh heh.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LUNCHCLERK01739_000_030<tab>全部届けてきてくれたんだね、ありがとう。
結構歩き回ったでしょう？
雲海は皇都より空気が薄いから、すぐに疲れちゃうのよねぇ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LUNCHCLERK01739_000_031<tab>It's worth it to see their smiling faces, though. I know they say I should take things easy, but age is no excuse for letting up on my duties.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LUNCHCLERK01739_000_031<tab>でもまぁ、そうかい……みんな喜んでいてくれたんだね。
そりゃあ何よりってものだよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LUNCHCLERK01739_000_032<tab>I won't deny I've had second thoughts about staying, what with the thinner air here in the Sea of Clouds and all... But have you tried <var 1A 02 /var>their<var 1A 01 /var> cooking? No one should have to suffer such unsavory fare, and they won't so long as I'm here.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ014_01739_LUNCHCLERK01739_000_032<tab>ふふふ、こりゃ歳だからと休んでられないじゃないか。
そろそろ体力的にも引退しようかと思ったんだけど……
もうちょっと、がんばってみようかしらね！
